thread.title: Could Buffy star Anthony Head replace Peter Capaldi as the next Doctor Who?
thread.title_full: Could Buffy star Anthony Head replace Peter Capaldi as the next Doctor Who?

author: Vicki Newman
title: Could Buffy star Anthony Head replace Peter Capaldi as the next Doctor Who?
text:
Could Buffy star Anthony Head replace Peter Capaldi as the next Doctor Who? The Buffy star chatted about the possibility on Good Morning Britain Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Anthony Head wouldn't say no to being Doctor Who Share this video Get daily   Thank you for subscribing!   
Doctor Who fans are dying to know who will replace Peter Capaldi as the next Time Lord. 
After the Scottish actor announced he'd be bowing out of Doctor Who, there has been a lot of speculation over who will take on the famous role. 
Buffy The Vampire Slayer's Anthony Head chatted about the possibility of becoming the next time travelling Doctor on Thursday's Good Morning Britain. 
The actor was chatting with Ben Shephard and Susanna Reid about his career and what's next to come. Read More Will he be the next Time Lord (Photo: ITV) Ben Shephard asked if he'd consider the role (Photo: ITV) 
When asked if he'd take on the role - recently voted the world's second favourite BBC character - he said: "I don't know, no one's asked, but I wouldn't say no. 
"Well, would anybody say no?" 
So far, a lot of names have been mentioned in the hunt for the next Time Lord. 
Actress Tilda Swinton is being hotly-tipped to be the first female to take on the character. 
Bookies are placing their bets on the Doctor Strange star to be the next Time Lord. Doctor Who fans are desperate to know who will play the Doctor next (Photo: ITV) He wouldn't say no! (Photo: ITV) 
Scottish Peter , 58, announced in January that he was stepping down from the role after playing the character - recently voted the world's second favourite BBC character - since 2013. 
London-born Tilda, 56, who has starred in a number of hit films, such as The Curious Case of Benjamin Button, The Chronicles of Narnia series and The Beach, is rumoured to be taking over as the thirteenth Doctor. 
A lot of rumours about who would take on the iconic role have been circulating since Peter announced his departure. Read More Series 10 will be Peter's last as the Doctor (Photo: BBC) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
